price: कि अपने खेत पर सवेरे ही जा पहुँचो, यदि तुम फल तोड़ने वाले हो।
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
